mapper.select: select uuid() as busCode,t.code as deviceCode, t.name as deviceName,t.categoryCode as deviceType, #{alertMsg} as alertRemarks,'0' as alertGrade, #{faultCode} as faultCode,#{faultName} as faultName, date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as triggerTime,t.positionId as addressId, '0' as status,#{source} as source from bes_device_function_point p inner join bes_device d on p.device_id = d.id inner join opm_assets_info t on t.id = d.id where t.hasDelete = '0' and p.sysName = #{sysname}
